scripts.start:frontend: cross-env PORT=3000 GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=false TSC_COMPILE_ON_ERROR=true ESLINT_NO_DEV_ERRORS=true react-scripts start
scripts.start:frontend:fast: cross-env PORT=3000 GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=false TSC_COMPILE_ON_ERROR=true ESLINT_NO_DEV_ERRORS=true FAST_REFRESH=false react-scripts start
scripts.start:backend: cd backend && cross-env MONGODB_URI="mongodb+srv://ozodbek:8BsppwrPScIwj4by@cluster0.dlopces.mongodb.net/alibobo?retryWrites=true&w=majority&appName=Cluster0" TELEGRAM_BOT_TOKEN="8084499185:AAH2oQQn7b0adh9I0V97wK5_4FqfLFn50nE" TELEGRAM_CHAT_ID="-1002936933249" npm run start:fast
scripts.start:backend:fast: cd backend && cross-env MONGODB_URI="mongodb+srv://ozodbek:8BsppwrPScIwj4by@cluster0.dlopces.mongodb.net/alibobo?retryWrites=true&w=majority&appName=Cluster0" TELEGRAM_BOT_TOKEN="8084499185:AAH2oQQn7b0adh9I0V97wK5_4FqfLFn50nE" TELEGRAM_CHAT_ID="-1002936933249" npm run start:fast
scripts.start:backend:turbo: cd backend && cross-env MONGODB_URI="mongodb+srv://ozodbek:8BsppwrPScIwj4by@cluster0.dlopces.mongodb.net/alibobo?retryWrites=true&w=majority&appName=Cluster0" TELEGRAM_BOT_TOKEN="8084499185:AAH2oQQn7b0adh9I0V97wK5_4FqfLFn50nE" TELEGRAM_CHAT_ID="-1002936933249" NODE_ENV=development SKIP_INDEX_CREATION=true ENABLE_CLUSTERING=false DEBUG=false node server.js
scripts.dev:safe: concurrently --names "BACKEND,FRONTEND" --prefix-colors "blue,green" --success "first" "cd backend && cross-env NODE_ENV=development DEBUG=true npm start" "cross-env REACT_APP_DEBUG_MODE=true npm run start:frontend"
scripts.dev:backend-only: cd backend && cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm start
scripts.dev:debug: concurrently --names "BACKEND,FRONTEND" --prefix-colors "blue,green" --kill-others-on-fail "cd backend && cross-env NODE_ENV=development DEBUG=true npm start" "cross-env REACT_APP_DEBUG_MODE=true npm run start:frontend"
scripts.frontend: cross-env PORT=3000 GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=false TSC_COMPILE_ON_ERROR=true ESLINT_NO_DEV_ERRORS=true react-scripts start
scripts.frontend-only: cross-env PORT=3000 GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=false TSC_COMPILE_ON_ERROR=true ESLINT_NO_DEV_ERRORS=true react-scripts start
scripts.performance:test: npm run test:performance && npm run test:api-performance
scripts.poststart: echo "ðŸš€ Development environment started! Run 'npm run health' to check service status."
